Name: Add logpoint
Description: Can I add log points to source code for debugging?
Author: @pankajparashar

Chrome.Notes: 1. **Sources** > Right click on the line number and select "Add logpoint..." to log in the **Console** without actually writing `console.log` statements.
Chrome.Name: Add logpoint

Firefox.Notes: 1. **Debugger** > Right click on the line number and select "Add log" to log in the Console without actually writing `console.log` statements.
Firefox.Name: Add logpoint

Edge.Notes: 1. **Sources** > Right click on the line number and select "Add logpoint..." to log in the **Console** without actually writing `console.log` statements.
Edge.Name: Add logpoint

Opera.Notes: 1. **Sources** > Right click on the line number and select "Add logpoint..." to log in the **Console** without actually writing `console.log` statements.
Opera.Name: Add logpoint
